title: What are some Kpop song suggestions that are up-beat? - Quora

response.answer_text: KDA-Popstars Girls Day-I’ll be yours CLC- Hobgoblin,Black Dress Pristin V- Get it Big Bang-Bang Bang Bang, Fxxt It, Sober,Fantastic Baby Blackpink(Pretty much every song of theirs except Stay is upbeat) Bts-Dope,Not Today,No More Dreams,DNA,Idol Twice(they have cheery upbeat style)-Dance the Night Away,TT,Cheer up,Heart Shaker Winner-Everyday,Really Really Exid-Hot Pink,DDD,I Love You,Up and Down Exo-Tempo,Overdose,Monster,Call me Baby Seventeen-Mansae VAV-Senorita Super Junior-Lo Siento,One More Time Mamamoo-Egotistic Hyuna-Red,Lip&Hip Sunmi-Gashina CL-Hello Bitches August D(the entire album) Red Velvet- Peek a Boo,Dumb dumb,Ice cream Cake,Rookie 2NE1-I’m the Best,Come Back Home NCT-Cherry Bomb,Regular,Boss Jennie-Solo Pentagon-Shine Gidle-Latata,Dollar Then there’s like a million more but here are some artists/groups who have some songs which are upbeat and catchy GD,Shinee,Got7,Dreamcatcher,SNSD,Wonder Girls,IOI,Sistar,missA,Apink,Stray Kids, AKMU,Day6,etc Hope this was helpfull. Enjoy!

Badass, “party hard” songs with a hip hop or trap feel: 4Minute - Crazy2NE1 - I Am The BestTaeyang - Ringa LingaBlack Pink - BoombayahCL - Hello Bi+chesAnd a few of BTS’ songs like Not Today, Fire, Crow Tit, & 21st Century GirlsIf you’re looking for fun, jolly songs, here are some dance-pop/EDM and others: KARD - Oh Na NaBTS - Interlude: Wings (or Outro: Wings for the full version)BTS - Fun BoysSeventeen - Adore USeventeen - Very NiceSHINee - Married to the MusicSISTAR - Touch My BodyHope you like them! :)
